rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {04, 05, 06, 06G, 06PG, 06PGZA, 07, 07G, 07PG, 11, 42, 50PG, 56, 76, 78}

description: This unit is an introduction to health care research.Students will learn how to formulate research questions, examine different research methodologies and critically appraise a research study.Students also learn how to search for and review literature and formulate a research question that addresses a gap in the evidence.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
